name: Octopus Love
description:
Welcome to the world's first (and only)* Doc Ock dating sim! 

The instructions are simple - use the right arrow key to proceed through the lines of dialogue, and click your mouse to select your chosen answer. 

*as far as I'm aware 

--------------------------------------

NOTE: this is a *beta* version - I developed this game for my programming MSc coursework and so was restricted by deadlines. As a result, it is missing a few key features I intend to implement such as sound, character movement, and other miscellaneous improvements. These will be added as soon as I can get round to them! 

--------------------------------------

Credits: 

  • Development, art, & storyline: Alucodev 
  • Doctor Octopus: Stan Lee and Steve Ditko; Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. 
  • Fonts: 'Cheeky Rabbit' by Ayu Lovayu and 'Bakso Sapi' by Locomotype

Disclaimer: I do not claim to own Doctor Octopus, Spider-Man, or any related character or franchise. This is a fan-made game and I make no profit.
